description:
Wow! I am so impressed by this handsome young man!
He's got something very A&F about him, and between his 6'5" frame and good looks, he draws attention nearly everywhere he goes.
Blake is bi, but I am guessing he might be leaning more to the boy side of life. He is young after all, and still settling in to his sexuality. His interview is great, and he is one of the few guys where his deeply masculine (dare I say "Straight") voice would send my gaydar spinning like a compass in a magnetic storm. Is he or isn't he?
Some models absolutely get turned on by being filmed and photographed, and Blake is thankfully one of those guys. He just had to touch his dick through his underwear, and his dick got hard in anticipation of being exposed. He loved showing off!
In his video, there is a real-time segment of him just playing with his dick in his underwear, and it is pretty hot to watch him get aroused right before your eyes in a mere minute.
Blake is super friendly, loves to party, and has the heart and style of an artist.
This guy was great to work with, and hopefully you will be seeing more of him soon! ~wink~
title: Blake - Solo
